summary:
Ilbert is a full stack / mobile developer with more than 10 years experience.
He is an enthusiastic and very motivated person, has always been hard working and goal's focused with proven results.
Starting as a web developer, he gained an extensive background in PHP frameworks (mainly cakephp and laravel),
and got involved in solving a range of problems: from customer's requirements analysis, system design and web scalability; which leaves him well suited to develop scalable and maintainable applications.
After that, he started developing mobile applications, both for iOS and android platforms, and even hybrid technologies, such as phonegap, ionic and react native.
Beign exposed to the mobile development challenges, he learned not only the platforms itself, but also focused on developing adaptive, maintainable and testable applications, embracing clean architectures such as MVP and MVVM.
 Currently he works remotly as a senior software developer, developing and maintaining applications for the company's customers.
His experience and understanding of industry best practices offer a productive and contributory presence to both small and large team environments.

experience.description:
Develop an iOS application for registering, evaluating and selling (auction-based) used cars in PanamÃ¡.
Develop the backend application for supporting API calls and business related services, using firebase services for database and storage.

Responsible for the development and maintenance of mobile applications, particularly for android and iOS devices. My primary focus is to integrate with backend services, and provide solutions for common problems, such as displaying great on multiple device sizes, make the apps work well with poor network connectivity, etc.

experience.tags: project management, team lead, coaching, software architect
experience.description: Working with other key members on projects to come up with the goals, objectives and achieve the milestones. Play a key role in improving company best practices and coding conventions. Tutoring 3-5 junior and senior developers to ensure software quality and keep projects on schedule.
